name: Drone Control
description:
Created in less than 48 hours for the AIE Alphabet Gamejam

The player begins in the main lobby of OHNO Labs, a multi billion dollar corporation scheming to take over the world. You enter as an agent within their secret drone development facility to stop the building of an army of dangerous human deconstruction drones. You are armed only with a Quantum Pistol aiming to complete a mission to take out these dangerous drones and save the world.

ControlsOculus TouchViveShootRight TriggerRight TriggerReload/Cooldown WeaponRight GripRight Trigger Programmers:

Justice S.

Ray S.

Artists:

Travis F.

Travis B.

Jacob N.

Designer:

Randal M.

Your device must meet Oculus/SteamVR specifications.

  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater.
  • Alternative Graphics Card: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater.
  • CPU: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater.
  • Memory: 8GB+ RAM.
  • Video Output: Compatible HDMI 1.3 video output.
  • USB Ports: 1x USB 3.0 port, plus 2x USB 2.0 ports.
